name: Flying Colors
description:
Flying Colors is a fast and frenetic space shooter. You use a laser machine gun and three powerful abilities to annihilate the fleet of ships out to get you. Get fuel for your abilities by destroying  the ships and taking their energy. But watch out because a mini boss is coming, that can take a maelstrom of lasers.

CONTROLS

Steering - A and D 

Shooting - Left Mouse

Dash - W Uses your green ability meter.

Force Field - S,Uses your blue ability meter. Throws up a large field that kills any enemy inside, does nothing against bosses.

Tail Gun - Space Uses your red ability meter. Fires a stream of lasers behind you.
